column5: Great Family Friendly home located just North of Austin. I am a quick 30 minute drive from Downtown Austin and centrally located to tons of family actives such as Hawaiian Falls Water Park, Star Ranch Golf Course, Round Rock Outlets, and Dell Diamond Stadium, home of the Round Rock Express. My home is less than 2 years old and has three spacious bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, an office space, and is walking distance from a community pool and park. Book your weekend getaway today!
column8: New Family Home Just Outside of the City!
